content: I'm new to FHIR and HAPI FHIR, and I want to create mulitiple Encounter records in one time for Encounter resources through the public FHIR server(http://hapi.fhir.org/), is there any way I can do that? thanks so much!
Look at batch or transaction on the http://hl7.org/fhir/http.html page

When I was in the Resources (http://hapi.fhir.org/resource) is created under it, I will be told: "impossible to bundle Resources stored on the server."Batch ".However, if I save it under transaction(hapi.fhir.org/home), it doesn't seem to be in the database because I can't find it by id.How do I save it in the database? Thank you very much!
I think that you are not using the right URLs - what is the base URL for HAPI?
I posted some data according to the link, it works, thanks so much :simple_smile:
